verses.verse: All the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%> shall ye observe <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> to do <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%>, that ye may live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and go in <S%H935><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and possess <S%H3423><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the land <S%H776><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto your fathers <S%H1><s%>.

And thou shalt remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> all the way <S%H1870><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> led <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8689><s%> thee these forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%> in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, to humble <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8763><s%> thee, and to prove <S%H5254><s%> <S%H8763><s%> thee, to know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8800><s%> what was in thine heart <S%H3824><s%>, whether thou wouldest keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8799><s%> his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, or no.

And he humbled <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8762><s%> thee, and suffered thee to hunger <S%H7456><s%> <S%H8686><s%>, and fed <S%H398><s%> <S%H8686><s%> thee with manna <S%H4478><s%>, which thou knewest <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not, neither did thy fathers <S%H1><s%> know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%>; that he might make thee know <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8687><s%> that man <S%H120><s%> doth not live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%> by bread <S%H3899><s%> only <S%H905><s%>, but by every word that proceedeth <S%H4161><s%> out of the mouth <S%H6310><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> doth man <S%H120><s%> live <S%H2421><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.
Thy raiment <S%H8071><s%> waxed not old <S%H1086><s%> <S%H8804><s%> upon thee, neither did thy foot <S%H7272><s%> swell <S%H1216><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, these forty <S%H705><s%> years <S%H8141><s%>.

Thou shalt also consider <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in <S%H5973><s%> thine heart <S%H3824><s%>, that, as a man <S%H376><s%> chasteneth <S%H3256><s%> <S%H8762><s%> his son <S%H1121><s%>, so the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> chasteneth <S%H3256><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee.

Therefore thou shalt keep <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, to walk <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8800><s%> in his ways <S%H1870><s%>, and to fear <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8800><s%> him.

For the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> bringeth <S%H935><s%> <S%H8688><s%> thee into a good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%>, a land <S%H776><s%> of brooks <S%H5158><s%> of water <S%H4325><s%>, of fountains <S%H5869><s%> and depths <S%H8415><s%> that spring out <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8802><s%> of valleys <S%H1237><s%> and hills <S%H2022><s%>;

A land <S%H776><s%> of wheat <S%H2406><s%>, and barley <S%H8184><s%>, and vines <S%H1612><s%>, and fig trees <S%H8384><s%>, and pomegranates <S%H7416><s%>; a land <S%H776><s%> of oil <S%H8081><s%> olive <S%H2132><s%>, and honey <S%H1706><s%>;

A land <S%H776><s%> wherein <S%H834><s%> thou shalt eat <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> bread <S%H3899><s%> without <S%H3808><s%> scarceness <S%H4544><s%>, thou shalt not lack <S%H2637><s%> <S%H8799><s%> any thing in it; a land <S%H776><s%> whose stones <S%H68><s%> are iron <S%H1270><s%>, and out of whose hills <S%H2042><s%> thou mayest dig <S%H2672><s%> <S%H8799><s%> brass <S%H5178><s%>.

When thou hast eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8804><s%> and art full <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, then thou shalt bless <S%H1288><s%> <S%H8765><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%> for the good <S%H2896><s%> land <S%H776><s%> which he hath given <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8804><s%> thee.

Beware <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8734><s%> that thou forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8799><s%> not the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, in not keeping <S%H8104><s%> <S%H8800><s%> his Mitzvot <S%H4687><s%>, and his judgments <S%H4941><s%>, and his statutes <S%H2708><s%>, which I command <S%H6680><s%> <S%H8764><s%> thee this day <S%H3117><s%>:

Lest when thou hast eaten <S%H398><s%> <S%H8799><s%> and art full <S%H7646><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and hast built <S%H1129><s%> <S%H8799><s%> goodly <S%H2896><s%> houses <S%H1004><s%>, and dwelt <S%H3427><s%> <S%H8804><s%> therein;

And when thy herds <S%H1241><s%> and thy flocks <S%H6629><s%> multiply <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and thy silver <S%H3701><s%> and thy gold <S%H2091><s%> is multiplied <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8799><s%>, and all that thou hast is multiplied <S%H7235><s%> <S%H8799><s%>;

Then thine heart <S%H3824><s%> be lifted up <S%H7311><s%> <S%H8804><s%>, and thou forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, which brought thee forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8688><s%> out of the land <S%H776><s%> of Egypt <S%H4714><s%>, from the house <S%H1004><s%> of bondage <S%H5650><s%>;

Who led <S%H3212><s%> <S%H8688><s%> thee through that great <S%H1419><s%> and terrible <S%H3372><s%> <S%H8737><s%> wilderness <S%H4057><s%>, wherein were fiery <S%H8314><s%> serpents <S%H5175><s%>, and scorpions <S%H6137><s%>, and drought <S%H6774><s%>, where there was no water <S%H4325><s%>; who brought thee forth <S%H3318><s%> <S%H8688><s%> water <S%H4325><s%> out of the rock <S%H6697><s%> of flint <S%H2496><s%>;

Who fed <S%H398><s%> <S%H8688><s%> thee in the wilderness <S%H4057><s%> with manna <S%H4478><s%>, which thy fathers <S%H1><s%> knew <S%H3045><s%> <S%H8804><s%> not, that he might humble <S%H6031><s%> <S%H8763><s%> thee, and that he might prove <S%H5254><s%> <S%H8763><s%> thee, to do thee good <S%H3190><s%> <S%H8687><s%> at thy latter end <S%H319><s%>;

And thou say <S%H559><s%> <S%H8804><s%> in thine heart <S%H3824><s%>, My power <S%H3581><s%> and the might <S%H6108><s%> of mine hand <S%H3027><s%> hath gotten <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8804><s%> me this wealth <S%H2428><s%>.

But thou shalt remember <S%H2142><s%> <S%H8804><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>: for it is he that giveth <S%H5414><s%> <S%H8802><s%> thee power <S%H3581><s%> to get <S%H6213><s%> <S%H8800><s%> wealth <S%H2428><s%>, that he may establish <S%H6965><s%> <S%H8687><s%> his covenant <S%H1285><s%> which he sware <S%H7650><s%> <S%H8738><s%> unto thy fathers <S%H1><s%>, as it is this day <S%H3117><s%>.

And it shall be, if thou do at all <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8800><s%> forget <S%H7911><s%> <S%H8799><s%> the YY <S%H3068><s%> thy 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>, and walk <S%H1980><s%> <S%H8804><s%> after <S%H310><s%> other <S%H312><s%> 'elohim <S%H430><s%>, and serve <S%H5647><s%> <S%H8804><s%> them, and worship <S%H7812><s%> <S%H8694><s%> them, I testify <S%H5749><s%> <S%H8689><s%> against you this day <S%H3117><s%> that ye shall surely <S%H6><s%> <S%H8800><s%> perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8799><s%>.

As the nations <S%H1471><s%> which the YY <S%H3068><s%> destroyeth <S%H6><s%> <S%H8688><s%> before your face <S%H6440><s%>, so shall ye perish <S%H6><s%> <S%H8799><s%>; because <S%H6118><s%> ye would not be `Ovedient <S%H8085><s%> <S%H8799><s%> unto the voice <S%H6963><s%> of the YY <S%H3068><s%> your 'Elohim <S%H430><s%>.
